title: MZMR Tracker Initial Release!
text:
The current release version of the MZMR Tracker can be found in EmoTracker, and the dev version can be found on GitHub. (The dev version may be unusable)

title: Streaming Schedule
text:
My current schedule is very fluid. I may stream on any day, but I’ll usually be streaming in the evening on days I do.

title: Welcome to Quarto!
text:
This is the first post since switching to Quarto. Welcome! Just changed over to Quarto for funsies, I guess. Wordpress wasn’t my favorite, and this is… slightly better. Not much, but better.


以上

title: About
text: Info about a bunch of random things I’m doing. These can include Japanese language and teaching, stable diffusion, math, programming, etc. I’m hoping I can be at least somewhat entertaining and informative!

title: Happy Christmas Eevee!
text:
Happy Christmas Eevee, everyone! And Happy Holidays to everyone who doesn’t celebrate Christmas! I personally like to celebrate the solstice :)
Credit to Miryusune on DeviantArt for the really cute image. Check them out for more cute Pokemon pics!




メリークリスマス！

title: Happy Holidays!
text:
Happy Christmas! Happy belated solstice! Happy holidays, everyone! I hope you’re all having a wonderful day!




メリークリスマス！
